accounts.description: These are your Ethereum addresses. The identicons are generated based on the address value. Note, balance is static.

sellContract.description: Sell holdings. Note, if the sell result remains zero you may not have enough ETH for the transaction fee.
sellContract.deployed: The contract was deployed to this address

buyContract.description: Make a purchase. Note, if the buy result remains zero you may not have enough ETH for the transaction fee.
buyContract.deployed: The contract was deployed to this address

multiplyContract.description: Create a new contract and interact with it through the api call method. Note, if the multiply result remains zero you may not have enough ETH.
multiplyContract.deployed: The contract was deployed to this address
